summary: Thieves Guild armor with Legend of Zelda theme
descriptionHtml:
This is a retex of Linwe\'s Hood,  Guild Master Armor (to prevent the whole guild from looking like you) Linwe\'s gloves and boots (for the enchantments towards combat). 

Hi resolution cloth textures with chainmail accents. Triforce on shoulder too.

INCLUDED: 

Olive GUILD MASTERS ARMOR, not standard thieves guild armor. 
Olive LINWES HOOD, 
Leather LINWES BOOTS and GAUNTLETS

Tutorial on how to make your your darkelf, woodelf or highelf a little less elven and a little more human. (skin tones, eye color ect.) IN THE README FILE. Included a picture of my Darkelf-Nord to show results.

THE MASTER SWORD AND SHIELD ARE NOT PART OF MY MOD DOWNLOAD AS THEY ARE FROM ANOTHER AUTHOR, I USED THEM TO ILLUSTRATE A SKYRIM LINK IN MY PHOTOS.

So here is a plug for that guy so he can get more downloads for his awesome work.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3216 

--------------
UPDATE 1.5
--------------
Added new higher resolution chainmail texture with bump map.  Now looks like real chainmail.
author: Handski
